name: Nykaa Sealed with a Kiss! Lipstick Palette - Flower Child 02
description: Nykaa's Sealed With a Kiss Lip Palette is all you need to pucker and pout. This multi-tasking palette features expertly coordinated color combinations of intensely pigmented matte lip cream that gives you the coverage of a matte lipstick and blendability of a blusher. Each shade stands alone or can be blended together for a customized shade. When you can't decide on just one lip shade to buy, don't. Just pick up one of these lip palettes instead.

name: ZM Zayn & Myza Rich Matte Lipstick - Savage
description: Stay pimple-free, naturally! ZM Naturals Neem & Tea Tree Serum is enriched with natural actives of neem and tea tree extracts that fight pimple-causing bacteria and reduce acne. Infused with salicylic acid that helps control oil. This lightweight, non-sticky potion of nature keeps your skin fresh and hydrated, all day long. It is suitable for both, day and night use.

name: SUGAR Smudge Me Not Lip Duo - 02 Brink Of Pink (Plum Rose)
description: Ladies, guess what? The cult-favourites have now arrived in the all-new SUGAR Smudge Me Not Lip Duo! With the perfect vivid and matte finish of the Smudge Me Not Liquid Lipstick, the high shine of the moisturizing gloss and the perfect mix of matte and gloss in one go ' this lipstick and gloss duo is the next most-wanted thing.

name: SUGAR Seal The Show Lip Primer
description: Lipstick aficionados, listen up! The ultimate lip game-changer is here.
